resources.string: Die BESTE War Thunder Wikipedia App.
Treten sie dem ThunderDex Subreddit bei!
Dr√ºcke hier, um den ThunderDex subreddit beizutreten! üòÅ
Schauen Sie sich die coolen Funktionen an, die f√ºr 2024 geplant sind
Sieh dir kommende App Funktionen an

ThunderDex wurde urspr√ºnglich im Jahr 2023 konzipiert.\nIch war ein h√§ufiger Nutzer des War Thunder Wiki und hatte es satt, es in meinem Browser zu verwenden.\nMit √ºber 10 Jahren Programmiererfahrung habe ich die App in wenigen Monaten entwickelt und beschlossen, sie f√ºr alle KOSTENLOS zu machen!
Klick hier, um zu lernen wie!
Klick hier um die Seite zu besuchen.
üç¶ Minispiel Easter Egg startet!\nGl√ºckwunsch zum finden. üç¶
Beim Abstruz der App, einfach neu √∂ffnen

Farbschemen werden irgendwann ein KOSTENPFLICHTIGES Feature.

 Farbschemen sind noch in der Testphase und k√∂nnnen noch fehlerhaft sein oder die App zum Absturz bringen

Sollte sie Abst√ºrzen, einfach die App neu √∂ffnen.
Es wird kostenlose Farbschemen geben.

Ich kann es kaum erwarten euch zu zeigen was ich noch f√ºr die App in 2024 geplannt habe.
Im Moment m√ºsst ihr noch, Themes manuell aktivieren und deaktivieren das sie richtig funktionieren. Wird bald behoben sein.\n\nFALLS SICH DIE APP SCHLIE?T ODER SIE ABST√úRZT, √ñFFNET SIE ERNEUT!
‚Ä¢ Erstellen einer Sprachauswahl, sobald gen√ºgend Sprachen hinzugef√ºgt wurden
‚Ä¢ Mehr Verbesserungen zur Ladegeschwindigkeit und genereller Leistung
‚Ä¢ Hinzuf√ºgen weiterer Informationen und vom Benutzer angeforderter Informationen
‚Ä¢ Hinzuf√ºgen eines Bereiches f√ºr das Downloaden von War Thunder-Hintergrundbildern direkt von der Webseite
‚Ä¢ Hinzuf√ºgen weiterer Farbschemen. (Dark themes only), check the Discord for more info (Join in the Settings)

4.2.0:
‚Ä¢ Fixed themed header not applying everywhere
‚Ä¢ Added "War Thunder Assistant" and "War Thunder Blue" themes
‚Ä¢ Updated vehicle group images
‚Ä¢ Added a ScrollView to themes finally
‚Ä¢ Fade out the ThunderDex TextView in the Header
‚Ä¢ Removed the annoying "paid themes" dialog
‚Ä¢ Unified ThunderDex Header text top padding, now consistent across all screens
‚Ä¢ Improved ThunderDex header Text Top Margins, now it doesnt sit so close to your status bar
‚Ä¢ Added code from the Home section that sets the colored Header on smaller screens to the Vehicle Group, Vehicle List and Settings
‚Ä¢ Adjusted Dull blue theme color and header via user suggestion
‚Ä¢ Adjusted Space cadet Theme color and header via user suggestion
‚Ä¢ UI adjustments
‚Ä¢ Simplify Settings
‚Ä¢ Added a button to help contribute translations to the app via Crowdin
‚Ä¢ Added Themed header to the Settings
‚Ä¢ improvement: add a fadeout to the text before disappearing in the themes section
‚Ä¢ Updated some libraries
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle to 8.9 (stable)
‚Ä¢ Easter Egg hint: Hold the button in the About section

4.1.5:
‚Ä¢ All Themes now have a Textured Header!! (looks nice)
‚Ä¢ Added "Space Cadet" Theme üòä
‚Ä¢ Fixed Game News / Game Updates tab overlapping ThunderDex Header text on devices ike the Pixel 7 Pro
‚Ä¢ Fixed the Header text being (uncomfortably) close to the StatusBar
‚Ä¢ Add Spanish translations via user request
‚Ä¢ Fixed Easter Egg crashing on launch (oops)
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle
‚Ä¢ Fixed up some code warnings via the analyzer (code improvement)
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle
‚Ä¢ Added back German translations
‚Ä¢ Improve Themes section UI
‚Ä¢ Add Firebase App tracking to the Themes section for research purposes
‚Ä¢ Easter Egg hint: Hold the button in the About section

4.1.4:
‚Ä¢ Add "ThunderTeal" and Slate Grey" Themes üòä
‚Ä¢ programmatically measure users StatusBar height and apply it towards the Headers Text top margin (fixes uncommon UI bug)
‚Ä¢ Adjusted App Themes UI, work in progress (it is to ensure users are able to select all Themes, will add scrolling ability soon)
‚Ä¢ Fix Vehicle Group Fragment missing colored Header on smaller devices
‚Ä¢ Localize dimensions (performance improvement)
‚Ä¢ Update Libraries and AGP
‚Ä¢ Update Gradle to 8.9-rc-1
‚Ä¢ Fix helicopter black border width thickness
‚Ä¢ Changed some values in the easter egg
‚Ä¢ Easter Egg hint: Hold the button in the About section


4.1.3:
‚Ä¢ Fix helicopter black border width thickness
‚Ä¢ Update AGP
‚Ä¢ Fix major app crash making it impossible to view vehicle info

4.1.2:
‚Ä¢ SDK 35 (Android 15 Beta 3+) compatibility for real this time
‚Ä¢ Double the disappearing text length in Themes
‚Ä¢ Easter Egg hint: Hold the button in the About section
‚Ä¢ Fix Theme not applied in some places
‚Ä¢ Added a Forest Green, Dark Red, Dull Blue and Darkish Blue Theme
‚Ä¢ Fix up Theme logic, dynamic app color shouldn't auto apply
‚Ä¢ Theme warning text disappears after two seconds, ensuring users can select all themes

4.1.1:
‚Ä¢ Fix vehicles at the bottom of the list being unclickable
‚Ä¢ Adjusted the "Almost Black" theme color (Made it a little bit lighter, #10101C to #212121 Hex code)
‚Ä¢ Removed AMOLED Black Theme for now
‚Ä¢ Themes now have a colored Header instead the image!

4.1.0:
‚Ä¢ THEMES ARE HERE! Introducing a Grey theme, an Almost Black theme and an AMOLED Black Theme
‚Ä¢ Themes are a work in progress and eventually will cost money to have
‚Ä¢ Add some more performance tracking for the app
‚Ä¢ Speed up the gradient animation in About
‚Ä¢ Replace the Dialog popup with a Toast when switching to Dynamic Theming
‚Ä¢ Added more planned features / reduced text size and changed font (Settings > About > Upcoming Features)
‚Ä¢ Removed unused sources and reduced the app size by 300kb
‚Ä¢ Small user interface adjustments‚Ä¢ Added an Easter Egg in the app. ;)
‚Ä¢ Finally updated the Shimmer library
‚Ä¢ Fixed content loading shimmer having strange sharp edges
‚Ä¢ Fixed missing translations in the app

4.0.2:
‚Ä¢ Add more planned features (see About in the Settings for more)
‚Ä¢ Fixed ThunderDex Header text being too close to the top near your status bar
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Updated AGP, Gradle, and app Libraries
‚Ä¢ Updated the design of the Upcoming Features section slightly (adjusted text font, added top margins to space out the text a little bit)
‚Ä¢ Adjusted background animation time in the Upcoming Features section in About
‚Ä¢ Adjusted the alpha (opacity) of the Splash Screen logo and circular loading animation

OLDER:
4.0.0:
‚Ä¢ Fixed a crash detected by google crashlytics on some devices
‚Ä¢ Fixed a long standing and critical issue for samsung devices that caused the app to close instantly. It is confirmed to be fixed.
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the vehicle info page [Added proper research icon, silver lion icon, enlarged the text, changed the text color, improved vehicle zoom]
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the home screen. [new header font, new header text animation, adjusted dimensions, adjusted theme]
‚Ä¢ Improved the design of the BottomNavigationBar
‚Ä¢ in the vehicle info section, numbers now have commas (example: 500 000 is now 500,000)
‚Ä¢ Adjusted some app colors
‚Ä¢ A Toast (popup message) now appears when you favorite/unfavorite a vehicle
‚Ä¢ Adjusted Dialog colors
‚Ä¢ Updated libraries, AGP, and Gradle
‚Ä¢ Various strings have been updated
‚Ä¢ Added Google Firebase libraries to track app performance, crashes and statistics (NO USER DATA IS COLLECTED)
‚Ä¢ Added more aggressive build optimizations
‚Ä¢ Enabled MultiDex to increase app launch speed and reduce size
‚Ä¢ Added the Build Number and Version Code in the "About" section 

3.6.0:
‚Ä¢ Redesigned and improved the About section
‚Ä¢ Show a Toast Notification when applying Dynamic Theming before the app restarts
‚Ä¢ Animate the Vehicle Images in the Wiki Tab
‚Ä¢ Enable the title on toolbar in some Fragments
‚Ä¢ Allow dismissing the Changelog Dialog without pressing Okay
‚Ä¢ Added a 0.95 alpha to some TextViews
‚Ä¢ Replaced the 20% black button BG with ripple in About
‚Ä¢ Changed lots of wording in the app
‚Ä¢ Minor fixes and improvements

3.5.6:
‚Ä¢ Included original German Translation credits
‚Ä¢ Updated Hungarian translations
‚Ä¢ Fixed "upcoming features" animated background not being full screen
‚Ä¢ Misc. small fixes
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle and Libraries

3.5.5:
‚Ä¢ Slightly reduced app size again by a couple hundred kilobytes
‚Ä¢ When you download a vehicle image, it now outputs a file with the vehicles name instead of random numbers
‚Ä¢ Fixed splash screen icon
‚Ä¢ Reintroduce "Upcoming Features" in the "About" section of the app
‚Ä¢ Included all app changelogs from 2.0.0 to the newest version, if you want to look back on updates (scroll down for updates)
‚Ä¢ Fixed splashscreen
‚Ä¢ Add German translation credits

3.5.1:
‚Ä¢ Misc. small changes

3.3.1:
‚Ä¢ Added Predictive Back Animations in the app
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the "Preview App Features" Preference
‚Ä¢ Added the ability to navigate back in the "preview upcoming app features" Preference
‚Ä¢ Updated the stars animation time in the "preview app features" preference
‚Ä¢ Updated Hungarian translations (Thanks tdikristof_ on Discord)

3.3.0 (big update):
‚Ä¢ Fix some text getting cut off on devices with smaller screens
‚Ä¢ Added a small divider in the Settings
‚Ä¢ Increased ThunderDex Header text size
‚Ä¢ Added a new setting that shows ThunderDex plans for 2024 :)
‚Ä¢ UI adjustments
‚Ä¢ Removed some of the summary text in the settings
‚Ä¢ Removed "Google Pay" donation option
‚Ä¢ Slightly redesigned the Settings
‚Ä¢ Text updates and changes
‚Ä¢ Updated Android Build Tools to 35.0.0rc3
‚Ä¢ Changed some height sizes of elements in the app
‚Ä¢ Fix text wrap issue on certain devices for the upcoming features preference

3.2.4:
‚Ä¢ Adjust vehicle image height 
‚Ä¢ Updated Android AGP
‚Ä¢ Library updates

3.2.3:
‚Ä¢ Added Android 9 support
‚Ä¢ Change text in a Dialog

3.2.2:
‚Ä¢ Adjusted vehicle image height... no more scrolling in the "wiki" tab.. :)
‚Ä¢ Fix changelog typo from 3.2.1
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes

3.2.1:
‚Ä¢ Fixed Google Pay not launching on older devices
‚Ä¢ Added an option to copy the Google Pay Email in the dialog

3.2.0:
‚Ä¢ Added cash app donation option
‚Ä¢ Added google pay donation option
‚Ä¢ Fixed up some code with the code analyzer
‚Ä¢ Changed the "Latest Updates" tab to "Latest Game Updates"
‚Ä¢ Lots of small text adjustments that you may or may not notice
‚Ä¢ Fixed all Java issues in the app
‚Ä¢ Further tweaks to elements in the app such as header height and image height

3.1.3:
‚Ä¢ Fix changelog not being up to date

3.1.2:
‚Ä¢ Updated AGP
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes

3.1.1:
‚Ä¢ Added Lithuanian and Hungarian translations (thanks to theslimyboi and Tdikristof_ on Discord for the translations)
‚Ä¢ Further reduced app size ;)
‚Ä¢ Made "ThunderDex" Header text slightly smaller

‚Ä¢ Expanded the height of Vehicle Images

3.1.0:
‚Ä¢ *** Decreased app size by ~4MB ***

3.0.1:

3.0.0:
‚Ä¢ BRAND NEW DESIGN!
‚Ä¢ Cleaned up the user interface
‚Ä¢ Added my ThunderDexApp subreddit
‚Ä¢ planes / jets has been changed to Aircraft

2.5.2:
‚Ä¢ Permanent discord link added! Please join the discord group (settings > discord)
‚Ä¢ Made image gradient slightly darker
‚Ä¢ Fixed the bug where the toolbar would include the gradient 

2.5.1:
‚Ä¢ Update the discord invite link

2.5.0:
‚Ä¢ Added the "usage in battles" section for vehicles
‚Ä¢ Vehicle images are now larger! :)
‚Ä¢ Vehicle image gradient fixed and adjusted ‚Ä¢ Slight UI adjustments
‚Ä¢ Removed translations again for now

2.0.0:
‚Ä¢ VEHICLE SEARCH ADDED
‚Ä¢ Further reduce app size
‚Ä¢ Prevent Dialog from being closed when touched outside :)
‚Ä¢ Added a nice gradient for the vehicle images

Hello, and Thank you for using ThunderDex.

The BEST and ONLY War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal, or the Cash App option!

-HiFii

Add option to choose how vehicles are filtered

Improvements to the vehicle image viewer

Add an option to download selected vehicle images

Add more translations

Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option

Even more improvements to loading and performance

Adding more information and user requested information too

Add a wallpaper section with a download ability!! (from the war thunder Wikipedia wallpaper site)
